about_the_game:
The world is already over, we just don’t know it.


Corti Co is a Science Fiction, Visual novel sandbox. Follow several people involved in a conspiracy surrounding Corti Co, an AI development and research firm.

Watch what you say


Discover multiple endings through what you say, who you choose to interact with and what you choose to do. Utilize Social Media, news articles, conversations, and your wits to induce the true nature of Corti Co.

Features

AI Q&A - Ensure that the “AI” is working properly as your job.



Legally distinct Tweeter - Message your friends, and be a headache for those unfortunate enough to be online.




Don’t date your boss. Its against ethical and corporate guidelines.
Branching narrative where your actions and what you say influence the stories destination.

content_descriptors.notes: Corti Co. contains references to suicide, violent imagery, corpses, and torture.

Corti Co is a Science Fiction, Visual novel sandbox. Follow several people involved in a conspiracy surrounding Corti Co, an AI development and research firm.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel x86_64
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Corti Co.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500 HD, AMD Radeon R5
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600k, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
